thread.title: Andrew Waugh
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Andrew Waugh

author: Andrew Waugh
title: Andrew Waugh
text: For any one hesitating over Solar for fear of pushy sales reps, choosing the wrong type of installation, dodgy installations and so on - I can't recommend Finn's SolarQuote: s more highly. Pages of clearly written information to study, numerous company and equipment reviews all before you are asked to leave any contact details. The three companies that Quote: d on our job were difficult to choose between as all of them were offering good equipment and back up - I could have happily gone with any of them.
